Keyboard shortcuts are the most efficient way to accomplish tasks that come up frequently in your coding workflow.
As you migrate from RStudio to Positron, maintaining your productivity means working with, not against, your muscle memory.

Many familiar shortcuts will work immediately, because they are built in to Positron and its integrated R support.
These are documented with [Positron's keyboard shortcuts](keyboard-shortcuts.qmd).
That is also where you can learn how to customize shortcuts.

## RStudio keybindings in Positron

A large set of RStudio keybindings can be enabled with the [`workbench.keybindings.rstudioKeybindings`](positron://settings/workbench.keybindings.rstudioKeybindings) setting.
Restart Positron after changing this setting.

| Shortcut | Description |
| -------- | ----------- |
| {{< kbd Ctrl-1 >}}  |  Focus Source |
| {{< kbd Ctrl-2 >}}  |  Focus Console |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-. win=Ctrl-. linux=Ctrl-. >}}  |   Go to Function/Symbol |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-C win=Ctrl-Shift-C linux=Ctrl-Shift-C >}} |  Comment/Uncomment a line |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-N win=Ctrl-Shift-N linux=Ctrl-Shift-N >}} |  Create a new R file |
| {{< kbd F2 >}} |  Go to definition |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-I win=Ctrl-I linux=Ctrl-I >}} |  Reindent selection |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-A win=Ctrl-Shift-A linux=Ctrl-Shift-A >}} |  Reformat selection |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-S win=Ctrl-Shift-S linux=Ctrl-Shift-S >}} |  Source the current R script |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-Shift-M win=Ctrl-Alt-Shift-M linux=Ctrl-Alt-Shift-M >}} |  Rename symbol  |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-I win=Ctrl-Alt-I linux=Ctrl-Alt-I >}} | Insert code cell (Quarto) |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Enter win=Ctrl-Enter linux=Ctrl-Enter >}} | Run current statement (Quarto) |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-Enter win=Ctrl-Shift-Enter linux=Ctrl-Shift-Enter >}} | Run current cell (Quarto) |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-M win=Ctrl-Alt-M linux=Ctrl-Alt-M >}} |  Open version control pane |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-← win=Ctrl-Alt-← linux=Ctrl-Alt-← >}} |  Go to previous tab |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-→ win=Ctrl-Alt-→ linux=Ctrl-Alt-→ >}} |  Go to next tab |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-D win=Ctrl-D linux=Ctrl-D >}} |  Delete the current line |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-H win=Ctrl-Shift-H linux=Ctrl-Shift-H >}}| Set working directory |
| {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-R win=Ctrl-Shift-R linux=Ctrl-Shift-R >}} |  Insert section |
| {{< kbd mac=Option-Shift-K win=Alt-Shift-K linux=Alt-Shift-K >}} | Open global keybindings list |
